item.title: 最高法院维持威胁美国 TikTok 禁令的法律
item.description: 最高法院维持了一项法律，该法律威胁最快将于周日关闭在美国大受欢迎的 TikTok 社交媒体平台。最高法院裁定，言论自由的权利必须让位于对中国控制该应用造成国家安全风险的担忧。【原文：The Supreme Court upheld a law that threatens to shut down the wildly popular TikTok social media platform in the US as soon as Sunday, ruling that free speech rights must yield to concerns that Chinese control of the app creates a national-security risk.】

item.title: 英国对美贸易顺差增长凸显特朗普关税威胁
item.description: 英国政府的数据显示，2023 年英国对美国的贸易顺差巨大，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）准备在白宫重启贸易保护主义之际，英国正处于风口浪尖。【原文：The UK ran a significant trade surplus with the US in 2023, British government data show, placing the country in the hot seat as Donald Trump prepares to revive his protectionist push in the White House.】

item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周五称，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）和美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Investment adviser units of Wells Fargo & Co. and Bank of America Corp.’s Merrill shortchanged customers by funneling uninvested cash into sweep accounts that benefited the banks but not their clients, the US Securities and Exchange Commission alleged Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税风险引发伦敦市场对黄金的疯狂追捧
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将征收普遍进口关税的风险正在引发全球黄金市场的新一轮动荡，备受关注的金银需求晴雨表在伦敦创下历史新高。【原文：The risk that President-elect Donald Trump will impose universal import tariffs is causing fresh turmoil in the global gold market, with a closely watched barometer of bullion demand reaching historic highs in London.】

item.title: 名爵汽车印度合资公司寻求降低混合动力电动汽车的税率
item.description: 中国上汽集团与印度 JSW 集团的合资企业计划明年推出插电式混合动力汽车，并寻求降低当地税率，以吸引对价格敏感的印度人购买这些更环保的汽车。【原文：A joint venture between China’s SAIC Motor Corp Ltd. and India’s JSW Group plans to roll out a plug-in hybrid car next year and has sought lower local taxes to lure price-conscious Indians to these greener vehicles.】

item.title: 相反论者称，如果美股下跌，加拿大是 "藏身的好地方
item.description: 多伦多一家资产管理公司称，加拿大股市的回报率已连续两年落后于美国股市。【原文：Canada’s stock market — where returns have lagged the US for two straight years — might offer investors protection against a downturn in US stocks, a Toronto-based asset manager says.】

item.title: 英特尔成为收购目标的报道引发股价大涨
item.description: 周五上午，英特尔公司股价大涨 7.6%，此前一家科技新闻网站报道称，这家陷入困境的芯片制造商是一个收购目标。【原文：Intel Corp. shares jumped 7.6% Friday morning after a report on a technology news site said the beleaguered chipmaker is an acquisition target.】

item.title: Fundment 借助高地基金估值将达到 1.5 亿英镑
item.description: 据知情人士透露，英国金融技术公司Fundment正在筹集新的资金，估值约为1.5亿英镑（1.83亿美元）。【原文：UK financial technology company Fundment is raising fresh funding at a valuation of about £150 million ($183 million), people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 波音罢工结束后美国工业生产超出预期
item.description: 美国 12 月份工业生产增幅超过预期，这主要得益于工厂产出回升，表明制造业在经历两年的疲软之后正在企稳。【原文：US industrial production rose in December by more than forecast, helped by a pickup in factory output that indicates manufacturing is stabilizing after two years of weakness.】

item.title: 高盛向所罗门和沃尔德伦颁发 8000 万美元留任奖
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）向其两位高管颁发了每人价值 8000 万美元的留任奖，并推出了一项新计划，让其领导层从私募股权基金赚取的结转利息中分一杯羹，试图在薪酬方面与顶级另类资产管理公司展开竞争。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. handed its top two executives retention awards valued at $80 million each and introduced a new program to give its leaders a slice of carried interest earned on private equity funds as it tries to compete on pay with top alternative asset managers.】

item.title: 莫桑比克反对党首领发出暂停抗议的信号
item.description: 莫桑比克反对党领导人蒙德拉内（Venâncio Mondlane）表示，他对暂停一直冲击着这个东南非国家的抗议活动持开放态度，即使公务员计划举行罢工。【原文：Mozambican opposition leader Venâncio Mondlane said he was open to pausing protests that have been hammering the southeast African nation, even as civil servants plan a pay strike.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收关税，欧盟与墨西哥达成贸易协议
item.description: 欧盟和墨西哥同意修订自由贸易协定，而两国都面临着当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的压力，特朗普威胁要对两国征收新一轮关税。【原文：The European Union and Mexico agreed to a revamped free-trade agreement, just as both are under pressure from President-elect Donald Trump, who has threatened them with a new round of tariffs.】

item.title: 债券大跌引发美联储减息是否失误的争论
item.description: 两周后，当美联储官员齐聚一堂时，他们可能会思考市场上一个令人费解的趋势：自 9 月份以来，当他们将短期利率下调整整一个百分点时，长期政府债券收益率也出现了大致相同幅度的波动，但方向却恰恰相反。【原文：When Federal Reserve officials gather in two weeks they’re likely to ponder a puzzling trend in markets: Since September, as they lowered short-term interest rates by a full percentage point, longer-term government bond yields moved by a roughly equal amount — but in the opposite direction.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）对里夫斯的预算案给予不温不火的支持，指出英国经济增长势头良好
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）对雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的大手笔预算只提供了冷淡的支持，将其对今年经济增长的预测仅上调了 0.1 个百分点，使其成为仅次于美国和加拿大的七国集团中增长第三快的经济体。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has offered only luke-warm support for Rachel Reeves’ big-spending budget, upgrading its growth forecast for this year by just 0.1 percentage points and leaving it as the third fastest growing Group of Seven economy behind the US and Canada.】

item.title: 墨西哥向特朗普示好，打压中国贸易
item.description: 首先是墨西哥城一家以销售中国制造的服装、玩具和电子产品而闻名的购物中心遭到搜查。然后是上个月，对包括特姆和Shein集团在内的外国电子商务公司的包裹征收近20%的关税，对一些纺织品征收更高的关税。【原文：First came the raid on a Mexico City shopping center known for selling Chinese-made clothing, toys and electronics. Then, last month, tariffs of almost 20% on packages from foreign e-commerce companies including Temu and Shein Group, and even higher duties on some textiles.】
